com.philips.platform.appframework.flowmanager.base

Class BaseFlowManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.platform.appframework.flowmanager.base.BaseFlowManager

  • public abstract class BaseFlowManager
extends java.lang.Object
    For using Flow Manager, the class has to be extending to this class.
    Since:
    1.1.0
